title: The Mission | Surf. Snow. Smart.
description: We needed a smartwatch that could keep up with us no matter where our days took us. So we made it. Powered by Android Wear™ and working hand in hand with Surfline and Snocountry, the Mission is equipped with preloaded apps and real-time surf and snow shred alerts right on your wrist so you’ll never-not-know. Available this fall.

asset.title: The Mission | Surf. Snow. Smart.
asset.description: We needed a smartwatch that could keep up with us no matter where our days took us. So we made it. Powered by Android Wear™ and working hand in hand with Surfline and Snocountry, the Mission is equipped with preloaded apps and real-time surf and snow shred alerts right on your wrist so you’ll never-not-know. Available this fall. Stay in the know at nixon.com/mens-smart
asset.author: Nixon

transcripts: Nixon’s product focus has always been to do the never been done so we looked at the concept we knew we had some interesting technologies to work with and we said what would be unique to the Nixon consumer. What would be a unique point of view that we could take and we had an idea to create a 4 wheel drive an all terrain vehicle for the wrist and that's where the idea of the Mission was born. We wanted to build a product that you could get outside and explore surfing and snowboarding and really be able to take this smart technology with you anywhere you go.
